divs: sighting detailsi was out walking the dog. i'm looking every time i walk outside. i seen a brght light in the west\north\west heading in a east south eastern direction. was only 1000 to 1500 feet in the air. was waitng to seen flashing lights. i have seen planes not have visable light at different angles. but as it only passed a quarter mile away from going over me, it was making no noise.i have a mag light 4-d batteries with a led bulb. it is focused to a small smot very far away from you like a laser. its very bright. i started to flash my light on and off at different speeds, like morse code. it started to speed up and went strait up into space!! only a mile away!!! it did not fly over the horizon. it went almost strait up! never thought i would see what a ship going strait out into space looks like. some one had to see it also and get a video, i hope. that was the coolest thing i have ever seen. i was in air force r.o.t.c in high school. we learned about planes, space shuttle, x-15. you name it, i have done a report on it. i have flown a plane before so i know how to fly a plane, and how it flies. ( the science of it.) even how a helicopter flies and any of them sound. flown in a huey-- or uh-1.you get to know the sound and how they fly. so you know when you see what doesn't fly like that! jeff tonn
Summary: just a bright light with small dim light in front. dim light never got closer or farther from main light.
